src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Kabinete nopotse kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la Naga la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato bile a dumelana gore go santse go le gontsi go go santseng go tlhoka go diriwa mo go baakanyeng diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase ka fa nageng..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwuncomile umsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokuqaliswa ukusetyenziswa kwesiCwangciso sokuSebenza soMbane, nangona ivumile ukuba iziko lombane lesizwe liseneengxakana elijongene nazo.

src_text: Jaaka naga tsena mo marigeng, Kabinete itumedisitswe ke konteraka e sa tswang go garelwa ya dimekawate di le 400 ya go oketsa motlakase ka Letsholo la go Reka Motlakase mo Ditlamong tse di Nang le Motlakase Montsi go Feta di Dirisang mme motlakase ono tla gokelelwa mo diyuniting tsa rona tsa motlakase pele kgwedi ya Motsheganong 2023 konosela..
tgt_text: Njengokuba singena kwixesha laseBusika kweli lizwe, iKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuqukunjelwa kwesiVumelwano sombane ozimegawathi (i-MW) ezingama-400 eziza kongezwa kulo sinawo ovela kwinkqubo ebizwa i-Standard Offer Programme oza kugalelwa kulo wesizwe phambi kokuphela kukaCanzibe wowama-..

src_text: Mo godimo ga seno, Lefapha la Boitekanelo le nopotse maokelo le 213 a sa tshwanelwang ke go kgorelediwa ke go tshabela ruri ga motlakase, mo go ona le 76 ke ao ntseng sa itemogele matsapa ano mme tiro ya go oketsa palo eno ka maokelo mangwe gape le 46 gatetse pele mo go bonagalang..
tgt_text: Ukongeza, iSebe lezeMpilo likhethe izibhedlela ezingama-213 ezingazikuchatshazelwa ngucimi-cimi wombane.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe gape le ke thankgololo e solofetsweng ya Lefelo la Ditirelo tse Dintsi tsa Merero ya Motlakase ka la bo 31 Motsheganong 2023 le le tla thankgololwang ke ba Dipeeletso tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa leng selo se se tla potlakisang dithulaganyo tsa go ikobela melao go tswela thuso ditlamo tse dintšhwa tsa motlakase gore le tsona di kgone go thusa nopotse kgatelopele e setseng dirilwe kwa Seteišeneng sa Motlakase sa Kusile go busetsa tirisong dimekawate di le 3 200 tsa yuniti ya bo 1, 2, 3 le 5 tsa motlakase mo bokhutlhong jwa ngwaga wa..
tgt_text: Kwezi zibhedlela, ezingama-76 sele zixhamla kule nkqubo yokungachatshazelwa ngucimi-cimi wombane, kwaye sele equkunjelwa amalungiselela ezinye ezingama-46 okuzikhusela kule ngxaki kacimi-cimi wombane.

src_text: Kabinete santse tlhobaediwa ke dikgang tsa maaka tse di tswelelang go phasaladiwa mo mafaratlhatlheng ditlhaeletsano tse di reng naga tlo welwa ke lefifi la go tlhoka motlakase ka ntlha ya go phutlhama ga diyuniti tsotlhe tsa tlamelo ya motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yawamkela nalo msebenzi uzayo wokusekwa kweZiko lezaMandla elinguNtozonke ngomhla wama-31 kuCanzibe 2023 yi-Invest SA ngeenjongo zokukhawulezisa iinkqubo zokuqulunqa imithetho eza kwenza ukuba kube lula kwiinkampani ezintsha ezivelisa umbane ukuba ziqalise umsebenzi wazo wokuvelisa umbane..

src_text: Eskom netefaleditse puso gore na le maano go tlhokomela diyuniti tseno go dira gore naga se iphitlhele mo seemong sa go welwa ke lefifi.
tgt_text: Ivile nangomsebenzi osele wenziwe kwiZiko loPhehlo-mbane laseKusile sokuba iphinde ivelise umbane ongama-3 200 MW isebenzisa i-unithi 1, 2, 3 no-5 oza kugalelwa kulo wesizwe phambi kokuba lo nyaka wama-2023 uphele.

src_text: Kabinete santse boeletsa boikuelo jwa yona jwa gore batho botlhe ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa ba tshwanetse go boloka motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixhalabile zindaba ezibubuvuvu ezisasazwa ngabantu besebenzisa amakhasi onxibelelwano ezityhola ngokuba iziko lombane leli liza kuwa into leyo eza kubangela ukuba isizwe sonke sibe sebumnyameni.

src_text: Maitlhomo ke go boloka motlakase yo kanaka dimekawate di le 1 000 ka letsatsi, mme seno se tla kgona go fokotsa motlakase o tshabetseng ruri ka kgato le nngwe letsatsi le letsatsi.
tgt_text: U-Eskom umxelele urhulumente ukuba unazo izicwangciso zokulalelisela xa kunokwenzeka ukuba umbane ucime pam kwizwelonke.

src_text: Tona ya Merero ya Motlakase, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, mo kopanong le bobegakgang ka Labotlhano wa la bo 26 Motsheganong 2023 tla baya naga mo dinakong ka dikgato tse di tserweng mo go tsenyeng tirisong Leano la go Tseela Motlakase Dikgato.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyaqhuba nekhwelo eyayilihlabile lokuba bonke abantu abaseMzantsi Afrika mabonge umbane.

src_text: Boitekanelo.
tgt_text: Iinjongo zethu kukuba sikwazi ukonga umbane oli-1 000 MW yonke imihla, umyinge lowo ulingana nenqanaba elinye lokucinywa kombane ngosuku ngalinye.

src_text: Go tloga ka la bo 24 Motsheganong 2023 Puso tlhomile Komiti ya Merero ya Setegeniki e eteletsweng pele ke Lefapha la Boitekanelo la Naga, go samagana le bolwetse jwa Kholera jo bo weleng kwa Hammanskraal mo masepaleng wa Teropo ya Tshwane, jo ga jaana bo setseng bo fetile ka matshelo le..
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezoMbane, uGq Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, uza kunika ingxelo ngeza kutsha nje malunga nokuqaliswa ukusetyenziswa kwesiCwangciso sokuSebenza sezaMandla ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2023, kwintlanganiso aza kube eyibambe noonondaba.

src_text: Go samaganwe le namane tona ya tiro ya go batlisisa gore bolwetse jono bo runtse kae ka tswa le mo metsweding ya metsi, diteroko tse di isetsang baagi metsi, mo dipompong le mo Seteišeneng sa go Tlhatswa Metsi a Leswe sa Rooiwal (WWTW).
tgt_text: Ezempilo.

src_text: Go fitlha mo motsing ono, ga go bopaki bope jo bo bontshang fa go na le kokwana ya kholera mo metsweding yotlhe eno, mme seno se re raya se re go wa ga bolwetse jono ke ka ntlha ya tiragalo le nngwe e diragetseng ga jaana fetileng mme balwetse ba bangwe ba ba tlhagelelang ga jaana ke ka ntlha ya fa ba tshwaetsana.
tgt_text: Urhulumente useke ikomiti yeengcali, ekhokelwa liSebe lezeMpilo likaZwelonke, eza kujongana nale ngxaki yokuqhambuka kwesifo sotyatyazo e-Hammanskraal kwisiXeko sase-Tshwane, apho sele kusweleke abantu abali-15 ngokweengxelo zomhla wama-24 kuCanzibe..

src_text: Jaaka go tsweletswe ka ditharabololo, baagi ba motse wa Hammanskraal ba rotloediwa gore ba bedise metsi a tswang mo dipompong mme ba topetse letswatswana pele ba ka nwa.
tgt_text: Sithetha nje uyaqhuba umsebenzi omkhulu wokuzingela izinto ezinokuba zizo ezingcolise amanzi, ukusuka emanzini la uqobo, ukuya kwiiloli ezithutha amanzi, iimpompo zamanzi kunye ne-Rooiwal Wastewater Treatment Works (i-WWTW).

src_text: Se sengwe gape, fa motho berekwa ke mala feroga dibete kgotsa na le matshwao motho yo tshwerweng ke mala motho yoo lebe kokelong kgotsa kwa tleliniking ya kwa motseng yo leng mo go ona.
tgt_text: Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, akukabikho bungqina bukhomba ukuba intsholongwane yesifo sotyatyazo ifumaneka kwezi zinto zikhankanyiweyo, into leyo ke efuna ukuhambelana nalo mbono uthi kungenzeka ukuba olu qhambuka lubangelwe yile ntsholongwane ethe yangena ngebhaqo emanzini, baze ke aba bantu banaso ngoku babe bosulelwe ngabanye abantu okanye bosulelwe ngabo nabo bosulelweyo.

src_text: Tona ya Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe, Rre Senzo Mchunu tla ikopanya le Meyara wa Masepala wa Teropo ya Tshwane, Mokhanselara Cilliers Brink, ka Labotlhano 26 Motsheganong 2023 maitlhomo le go loga leano mmogo la go samagana le go aga sešwa Rooiwal WWTW..
tgt_text: Njengoko la malinge okungenelela eqhuba, abahlali base-Hammanskrral bayacelwa ukuba bawabilise amanzi aphume empompeni baze bawathi chatha intwana yetyuwa phambi kokuba bawasele.

src_text: Go bona tshedimosetsoka botlalo ka letsetsa mogala wa tshoganyetso o dirang bosigo le motshegare wa Setheo sa Naga sa Malwetse a Fetelanang (NICD) mo go 082 883.
tgt_text: Ukongeza, nabani na osesisu esihambisayo, onesicaphu-caphu okanye olunywa sisisu kufuneka aye kwagqirha okanye kwiklinikhi ekufutshane ngokukhawuleza.

src_text: Maele go okobatsa bolwetse jwa kholera teng mo go www.nicd.ac.za.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezaManzi noGutyulo, uMnu Senzo Mchunu, uza kubamba intlanganiso noSodolophu wesiXeko sase-Tshwane, uCeba u-Cilliers Brink, ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2023 apho baza kupheka isicwangciso bobabini esiza kwenza umsebenzi ofanele ukuba wenziwe kudala wokulungiswa kwe-Rooiwal WWTW.

src_text: Dipatlisiso tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS).
tgt_text: Xa ufuna iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe, tsalela umnxemba iZiko leSizwe leziFo ezoSulelayo (i-NICD) elisebenza imini nobusuku kule nombolo: 082 883.

src_text: Kabinete tiisiwa mmoko ke seo pegelo ya 2023 ya QLFS se tlhagisang mo palo ya batho ba ba thapiwang tlhatlogileng garataro mo dikotareng ka go latelana mme palo ya batho ba ba nang le ditiro ba le.
tgt_text: Iindlela zokunyanga isifo sotyatyazo ziyafumena ku-intanethi apha: www.nicd.ac.za.

src_text: 2 milione atumelang mo go ba le.
tgt_text: UPhando lweKota lwezeMisebenzi (i-QLFS).

src_text: 4 milione leng palo re neng re le mo go yona pele ga COVID-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba i-QLFS yokuqala yowama-2023 ibonakalise ukuba inani lemisebenzi linyuke iikota ezintandathu zilandelana futhi nelabantu abaqeshiweyo abazizigidi ezili-.

src_text: Seno ke se supo se se tlhamaletseng sa gore ikonomi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa boela sekeng..
tgt_text: 2 linyuke lasondela kwela nani lezizigidi ezili-.

src_text: Dipalopalo tsa batho ba ba thapilweng mo kgweditharong ya ntlha di bontsha gore go tlhodiwle ditiro di le 209 000 mo ditirong tsa semmuno mmogo le tse dingwe di le 107 000 mo ditirong tseo seng tsa semmuso mo kgweditharong ya ntlha ya monongwaga.
Tirisanommogo ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Amerika.
tgt_text: zabantu ababephangela phambi kokufika kukabhubhane weNtsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete totobatsa kgang ya gore botsalano jwa naga ya Aforika Borwa le jwa Amerika santse le jwa go ntshana se se mo inong, jo bo sa nonofileng bile bo tswela maphata otlhe mosola ka go lekana mme seno se latela gore Tona ya Dikamano le Tirisano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhaba, Ngaka Naledi Pandor rwale maoto go kopana le Moambasatara wa naga ya Amerika, Reuben Brigety, go tšhotlha kgang ya gagwe ka go latofatsa naga ya Aforika Borwa gore rekiseditse naga ya Russia dibetsa.
tgt_text: Oku kubonisa ngokuphandle ukuba uqoqosho loMzantsi Afrika luyahluma kwakhona emva kokuba luthwaxwe ngula bhubhane.

src_text: Kabinete boeletsa mafoko yona gore go na le dikgato tse di tlhomilweng tse di itsegeng tsa setipolomate tsa go se gatane menwana ya maoto tse dinaga tsotlhe di itseng gore di tshwanetse go di latela, le yona Amerika, fa go na le sengwe se se ba tshwenyang gore go kgonwe go mekamekanwa le botsalano jwa dinaga ka bobedi.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha-mani zibonakalisa ukuba kudalwe imisebenzi engama-209 000 ngekota yokuqala kwicandelo lemisebenzi ebhaliswe ngokusesikweni yaze yangama-107 000 edalwe kwicandelo lemisebenzi engabhaliswanga ngokusesikweni kwikota yokuqala yalo nyaka.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke mafoko Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa gore go thankgololwe dipatlisiso tse di sa tseyeng letlhakore go batlisisa mofetsho ono wa gore naga ya Aforika Borwa rekiseditsa naga ya Russia dibetsa.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-United States (i-US).

src_text: Dintlha tse di ribololwang ke dipatlisiso tseno di tla itsisiwe mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikubethelele ukuba ubudlelwane phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-US busebuhle, bungqingqwa futhi bululutho kuwo omabini la mazwe emva kwentlanganiso ibiphakathi koMphathiswa wezoBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano, uGq Naledi Pandor kunye noNozaku-zaku wase-US eMzantsi Afrika, uMnu Reuben Brigety, emalunga nezityholo azenzileyo zokuba uMzantsi Afrika uthengisela i-Russia izixhobo.

src_text: Tirisanommogo ya naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Singapore.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikubethelela ukuba amaqonga afanelekileyo asetyenziswa ngoonozaku-zaku avuleleke kuwo onke amazwe, kuquka ne-US, ukuba avakalise izinto angaziqondiyo eziza kuchaphazela ubudlelwane phakathi kwamazwe.

src_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa ne amogetse Tonakgolo Lee Hsien Loong wa Naga ya Rephaboliki ya Singapore ka Labobedi, 16 Motsheganong..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isibhengezo esenziwe nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa sokuseka ikhomishoni yophando ezimeleyo ize iphande ezi zityholo zokuthengiselwa kwezixhobo kwe-Russia nguMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Naga ya Singapore beeletsa tota mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa, dipeeletso tsa teng di feta R5 bilione mo maphateng a jaaka la tlhagisodikuno, la ditirelo tsa matlole le la thekiso ya dintlo.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha zale khomishoni yophando ziza kubhengezwa kungentsuku zatywala.

src_text: Ditumelano tse di saenilweng magareng ga dinaga ka bobedi maitlhomo tsona ke go gagamatsa tirisanommogo mo mererong ya kgwebisano, dipeeletso, thuto mmogo le ya sesole..
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika ne-Singapore.

src_text: Imbizo ya Moporesitente ya Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo le le Ikaegileng ka Ditikologo (DDM) la Porofense ya Kapa Bophirima.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa ebendwendwelwe yiNkulumbuso u-Lee Hsien Loong weRiphabhlikhi yase-Singapore ngoLwesibini, umhla we-16 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa garetse Imbizo ya Moporesitente ya borataro ya DDM kwa Porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima, kwa Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Drakenstein, mo Tikologong ya Cape Winelands ka Labotlhano wa la bo 19 Motsheganong..
Moporesitente ne goga kwa pele baeteledipele botlhe ba maphata otlhe le mararo puso ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go se Nne le Ope yo Tlogelwang kwa Morago”.
tgt_text: I-Singapore ityale imali eninzi apha eMzantsi Afrika, kangangokuba ingaphezulu kweebhiliyoni ezi-R5 iimali etyalwe leliya lizwe kumacandelo afana nelemizi-mveliso, iinkonzo zezimali kunye nezokuthengiselwana komhlaba nezindlu.

src_text: Morago ga Imbizo Moporesitente ne jela nala lefelo le le gaufi le la Letsholo la Kago ya Mafelo Bodulo la Vlakkeland, mme leno ke la ntlha ka bogolo le le ka ga kago ya dintlo tsa setšhaba go fitlha mo motsing ono mo Masepaleng wa Selegae wa Drakenstein.
tgt_text: Izivumelwano ezityikityiweyo ngala mazwe mabini zineenjongo zokuqinisa ubudlelwano bezorhwebo, utyalo-mali, imfundo kunye nokusebenzisana kwimiba yezokhuselo.

src_text: Letsholo leno la kago le le simolotseng mo ngwageng wa 2017 tla re fa re garelwa la naya beng ba dintlo tseno ba le 2 556 magae..
tgt_text: Imbizo kaMongameli yaseNtshona Koloni yeNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweziThili (i-DDM).

src_text: Letsholo la go aga dintlo di le 942 kgato ya lona ya ntlha setse simolotswe, mme dintlo di le 454 di setse di feditswe go agiwa fa di le 301 tsona di santse di agiwa.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa ebebambe Imbizo kaMongameli yesithandathu ye-DDM eNtshona Koloni, kuMasipala weNgingqi wase-Drakenstein, kwiSithili sase-Cape Winelands, ngoLwesihlanu, umhla we-19 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Botlhokwa jwa porojeke eno ke go thusa ka ditsela tse di farologaneng tsa kemonokeng ka matlole go thusa ba ba senang letso le bao letseno la bona le fitlhang go R3 500 (ka letsholo la Breaking New Ground), mmogo le go dirisa letsholo la Finance Linked Individual Subsidy go thusa bao ka ngwaga ba iponelang megolo e magareng ga R3 501 le R22.
Mo porojekeng eno go agiwa ka bobedi dintlo tsa setšhaba le tsa Bagale ba Sesole.
tgt_text: UMongameli ebekhokele igqiza lawo omathathu amaqoqo karhulumente phantsi komxholo othi: “Kungashiywa Namnye Ngasemva”.

src_text: Leeto la go Lekola Maemo kwa Masepaleng wa Teropokgolo ya eThekwini le kwa Masepaleng wa Tikologo ya uMgungundlovu ka la bo 18 le la bo 19 Motsheganong.
tgt_text: Le Mbizo ibanjwe emva kokuba uMongameli ebetyelele i-Vlakkeland Catalytic Human Settlement Development ekutshane phaya, elelona phulo likhulu likarhulumente lokwakhiwa kwezindlu oko wasekwayo lo Masipala weNgingqi wase-Drakenstein.

src_text: Jaaka le karolo ya Leeto la go Lekola Maemo go Diragatsa DDM, mo leetong la gagwe la go lekola maemo Motlatsamoporesitente Paul Mashatile ne buisana le bannaleseabe mo maphateng thuto le tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni, temothuo, dikhomese le diintaseteri nngwe ya diporojeke tse di botlhokwa tse di jetsweng nala ke Projeke ya go Fetola Maemo ya Ntshongweni leng teng koo go agiwang Teropo e tla Dirisang Thekenoloji magareng ga Durban lePietermaritzburg.
tgt_text: Lo msebenzi wokwakha waqaliswa ngowama-2017 xa ugqityiwe uza kwakha izindlu ezingama-2 556 eziza kufunyanwa ngabantu abafanelekileyo.

src_text: Porojeke eno tla tsosolosa ikonomi mo lefelong leno, mme tla tsenya letseno ka go tlhagisa dipeeletso tse di ka fitlhang go R15 bilione mo dingwageng tse di tlang tse di ka fitlhang magareng ga di le 10 go fitlha go di le.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwezindlu ezingama-942 kwiSigaba sokuQala wona sele uqhuba, ezingama-454 zona sele zakhiwe zona ezingama-301 zisakhiwa.

src_text: Mafaratlhatlha Metsi.
tgt_text: Eli phulo libalulekile kuba lakha iintlobo zezindlu ezahlukeneyo ukusukela kwezo zabo bamkela umvuzo oyi-R0 ukuya kwabo bamkela i-R3 500 (phantsi komgaqo-nkqubo obizwa ngokuba yi-Breaking New Ground), ukuya kula nkqubo ibizwa ngokuba yi-Financed Linked Individual Subsidy Programme, yabo bamkela phakathi kwe-R3 501 ne-R22 000 ngonyaka.

src_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa ne jetse nala Porojeke ya Metsi a Tshologang kwa Dithabeng tsa Lesotho ka Labobedi wa la bo 23 Motsheganong 2023 mme ko teng ne tsaya karolo mo letsholong la go thankgolola kgato ya bobedi ya porojeke eno.
tgt_text: Le projekthi iza kwakha izindlu ezisiBonelelo sezeNtlalo kunye nezo zilungele amaGqala eeMfazwe.

src_text: Jaaka porojeke eno saenetswe go diragadiwa dingwaga di le dintsi tse di fetileng mmogo le go diegisiwa, mokete ono a bontsha gore jaanong tiro mo letsholong le le botlhokwa leno e leng mabapi le letsholo le legolo la dinaga di le pedi tla diragadiwa.
tgt_text: UTyelelo lokuHlola oluya kuMasipala oMbaxa waseThekwini noweSithili saseMgungundlovu ngomhla we-18 no-19 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Porojeke ya Metsi a Tshologang kwa Dithabeng tsa Lesotho botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore porofense ya Gauteng, Foreistata, Mpumalanga, Bokone Bophirima le Kapa Bokone di nne le metsi.
tgt_text: USekela-Mongameli u-Paul Mashatile ebebambe indibano yokufakana imilomo kunye namahlakani akwicandelo lezemfundo noqeqesho, ezolimo, ezorhwebo kunye nezoshishino ngethuba ekutyelelo lokuya kuhlola kuMasipala oMbaxa waseThekwini kunye noMasipala wesiThili saseMgungundlovu njengenxalenye yotyelelo lwe-DDM lokuya kuhlola.

src_text: Dipeeletso mo mafaratlhatlheng metsi go fetola matshelo maAforika Borwa di tswelela mo go ntshitsweng R14 bilione go neela dimasepala go samagana le matsapa tshalelomorago ya mafaratlhatlhatlha metsi, mme matlole ao tla tswa mo Mading Kago ya Mafaratlhatlha Magolo Metsi (RBIG) mmogo le mo Mading Ditirelo tsa Mafaratlhatlha Metsi (WSIG).
tgt_text: Ezinye zeeprojekthi ezingundoqo yile yase-Ntshongweni Catalytic Project, apho kuza kwakhiwa isiXeko Sale Mihla phakathi kweTheku noMgungundlovu.

src_text: RBIG tla dirisa madi go thusa diporojeke di le 130 mme WSIG yona tla thusa diporojeke di le 400 naga ka bophara.
tgt_text: Le projekthi iza kuvuselela uqoqosho lwale ngingqi, ize izale namathuba otyalo-mali axabisa imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-15 kule minyaka ili-10 ukuya kweli-15 izayo.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e diriwang ke Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe (DWS) mo go lwantshaneng le bonweenwee mo madi ka fitlha go R600 milione buseditsweng lefapha ke ditlamo tse di neng di neelwa dithendara go se mo molaong.
tgt_text: Iziseko ezingundoqo zamanzi.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa gape le ke dikgato tsa thibelo le taolo go fedisa tiriso ya madi go sa mo molaong, tshenyo ya madi le tirisobotlhaswa ya madi.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa ebendwendwele i-Lesotho Highlinds Water Project ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-23 kuCanzibe 2023 ngethuba ethatha inxaxheba kumsitho wokuphethulwa kwesoyi wesiGaba 2 sale projekthi.

src_text: Dikabo tsa Tlhokomelo ya Baagi.
tgt_text: Le projekthi yatyikitywa kule minyaka iliqela igqithileyo futhi nethe yalityaziswa zizinto ezininzi, lo msitho ubuluphawu olubonisa ukuqaliswa komsebenzi okhawulezileyo wale projekthi yamazwe amabini.

src_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa neetswe tlotlo ke Setheo sa Lefatshe sa Tlhokomelo ya Baagi (ISSA) ka go abela Kabo ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya Kontinente ya Aforika ya Tlotlo ya Tiro e Tswileng Diatla mo go Tlhokomeleng Baagi, mme kabo eno akgola dipeeletso tsa puso mo matshelong bana, segolobogolo mo baneng ba ba tswang kwa malapeng a dikobo dikhutshwane.
tgt_text: I-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ibaluleke kakhulu kumalinge okuqinisekisa ukuba kukho amanzi oneleyo e-Gauteng, Freyistatha, Mpumalanga, Mntla Ntshona naseMntla Koloni..

src_text: Maemo naga ya Aforika Borwa go tsenela dikabo tseno tse di tlotlegang ne bediwa: “Go atolosa ka iketlo tlhokomelo ya baagi go thusa bana ba ba dikobo dikhutshwane: Mo ntlheng ya go Neela Megolo ya Bana, mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa ”.
tgt_text: Ukutyala imali kwiziseko ezingundoqo zamanzi ukwenzela ukuphucula iimpilo zabemi boMzantsi Afrika kuqhubelekile ngokuthi kwabelwe oomasipala imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-14 eza kusetyenziswa kwiziseko ezingundoqo zamanzi ezisanqongopheleyo, kusetyenziswa isibonelelo esibizwa ngokuba yi-Regional Bulk Infrastructure Grant (i-RBIG) kunye nesibizwa ngokuba yi-Water Services Infrastructure Grant (i-WSIG).

src_text: Mo dikabong tseno go amogetswe dikopo di le 138 go tswa mo dinageng tsa Aforika tseo leng leloko di feta di le..
tgt_text: Isibonelelo se-RBIG siza kusetyenziswa kwiiprojekthi ezili-130 yona ke i-WSIG iza kusetyenziswa kwiiprojekthi ezingaphezulu kwama-400 kulo lonke eli lizwe.

src_text: Thuso ya baagi ke ntlha e botlhokwa thata mo letsholong la puso la go fedisa khumanego mme bile gape ntlha eno botlhokwa thata mo go busetseng batho ba borona seriti.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba iSebe lezaManzi noGutyulo lisenza umsebenzi obonakalayo kwidabi lokulwa urhwaphilizo kuba imali emalunga nezigidi zeerandi ezingama-600 sele ibuyiselwe kwisebe isuka kwiinkampani ebezixhamle ngokutyikitya izivumelwano nesebe ezingekho mthethweni.

src_text: Thulaganyo ya tlhokomelo ya baagi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa ke nngwe ya dithulaganyo tse dikgolo mo lefatsheng, mo batho ba ba unngwelwang mo go yona ba fetang ba le dimilione di le.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivile nangamanyathelo aqulunqwe lisebe okuthintela urhwaphilizo kunye nokulwa inkcitho engekho mthethweni neyilahleko.
IMbasa yeziBonelelo zeNtlalo.

src_text: Dipuo tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uphumele imbasa ephezulu ebizwa ngokuba yi-Good Practice Award in Social Security for Africa 2023 ye-International Social Security Association (i-ISSA) eqhwabela izandla imali etyalwe ngurhulumente kubomi babantwana bethu, ingakumbi abo baphuma kumakhaya asokolayo nangathathi ntweni.

src_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke gore Dipuo tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo di ntse di tsamaya ka thelelo.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ungenelele olu khuphiswano lwale mbasa phantsi kwesihloko esithi: “Ukwandiswa kancinci kwenani labantwana abasokolayo abaxhamla kwiinkonzo zentlalo: uPhando ngeMali-sibonelelo yaBantwana, eMzantsi Afrika”.

src_text: Lenaneo la dinako tsa Dipuo tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo tse di saletseng mmogo le dinako tsa dikopano le bobegakgang tse di emang nokeng dipuo tseno:..
tgt_text: Abebengenelele olu khuphiswano bebeli-138 bebonke bephuma kwimibutho engamalungu engama-48 yona evela kumazwe angaphezulu kwama-30 ase-Afrika.

src_text: Labotlhano wa la bo 26 Motsheganong 2023 ka 13:00, Tona ya Lefapha la Pusoselegae le Merero ya Setso<segment (CoGTA), Mme Thembi Nkadimeng tla tshwara kopano le bobegakgang mabapi le Puo ya Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya CoGTA mme yona tla tlhagisa dikgato tse di tla tsewang tse maitlhomo tsona leng go tokafatsa tiro ya dimasepala...
tgt_text: Izibonelelo zethu zezentlalo ziyinxalenye yenkqubo karhulumente yokulwa indlala kwaye zibaluleke kakhulu ekubuyiseleni abantu bakuthi izidima zabo.

src_text: Ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Motsheganong 2023, Tona ya Tlhabololo ya Loago, Mme Lindiwe Zulu, mmogo le Tona ya Tlhabololo ya Loago Ditirelo tsa Bosiamisi le tsa Kgopololo ya Batshwariwa, Rre Ronald Lamola, ba tla tshwara Dipuo tsa bona tsa Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo mme dintlha tsa ona ka ga dikopano le bobegakgang di tla itsisiwe mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo..
tgt_text: Inkqubo yezibonelelo-mali yoMzantsi Afrika iyenye yezona zinkulu kwihlabathi jikelele, kuba inabantu abaxhamla kuyo abangaphezulu kwizigidi ezili-.

src_text: Puo ya Thebolo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya Kantoro ya Moporesitente tla phasaladiwa ka Laboraro wa la bo 31 Motsheganong 2023 mme ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Motsheganong 2023 go tla tshwarwa kopano le bobegakgang mabapi le Kgatelopele e Dirilweng ka Phetogo ya Letsholo la Phetolo ya Ditheo mmogo le Matsholo Ditiro a tsamaisiwang ka Operation Vulindlela.
tgt_text: IVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali.

src_text: Segopotso sa Ngwaga wa bo 20 sa Letsatsi la go Keteka Boaforika mmogo le go Keteka Letsholo la go Sekasekana le Dinaga tsa Aforika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile zindaba zokuba iVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali zamasebe karhulumente ziqhuba kakuhle.

src_text: Kabinete mmogo le maAforika Borwa otlhe ba keteka mmogo kontinente ya Aforika le lefatshe ka bophara Letsatsi la go Keteka Boaforika ka la bo 25 Motsheganong.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso seeVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali ezisezayo kunye neentlanganiso noonondaba:..

src_text: Yo ngwaga botlhokwa segolobogolo ka ntlha ya gore ke ngwaga yo go ketekewing segopotso sa bo 60 sa go saeniwa ga lekwalo la ditumelano la Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganeng wa Aforika (OAU) e feleditseng le Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganeng wa Aforika (AU).
tgt_text: NgoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2023 ngentsimbi ye-13:00, uMphathiswa woLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli (i-CoGTA), uNksz Thembi Nkadimeng, uza kubamba intlanganiso namajelo eendaba ngeVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali ye-CoGTA apho aza kucacisa ngamanyathelo aza kuthatyathwa okuphucula umsebenzi woomasipala..

src_text: Molaetsamogolo wa mekete ya ngwaga wa 2023 – “Go potlakisa go tsenya tirisong Letsholo la Kgwebisano ya Dinaga tsa Kontinente ya Aforika Ntle le go Kgorelediwa ke Sepe” – akgola kgatelopele e diriwang mo go tsenyeng tirisong lefelo le legolo mo lefatsheng mo mererong ya kgwebisano.
tgt_text: NgoLwesibini, umhla wama-30 kuCanzibe, uMphathiswa woPhuhliso loLuntu, uNksz Lindiwe Zulu kunye noMphathiswa wezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko, uMnu Ronald Lamola, baza kuqhuba iiVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali zamasebe wabo.

src_text: Monongwaga Kgwedi ya Aforika tla ketekiwa ka nako le nngwe le ya go keteka segopotso sa bo 20 sa Tsamaiso ya Tebosešwa ya Dinagaleloko tsa Aforika (APRM) leng maitlhomo go tlhotlheletsa tsamaiso e lolameng ya puso mo kontinenteng ka go dirisa thulaganyo ya go ithuta mo go ba bangwe le go ikela tlhoko
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha zeentlanganiso zabo namajelo eendaba ziza kukhutshwa kwalapha exesheni..

src_text: Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: IVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali ye-Ofisi kaMongameli iza kwenziwa ngoLwesithathu, umhla wama-31 kuCanzibe 2023 ize intlanganiso noonondaba engoTshintsho kwiNdlela Elimi Ngayo uQoqosho kunye namaPhulo oDalo-msebenzi aququzelelwa yi-Operation Vulindlela, ibanjwe ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-30 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Mafelo a Itlhophileng Ikonomi (SEZ) kwa Namakwa.
tgt_text: USuku lwe-Afrika kunye nesikhumbuzo seminyaka engama-20 yeNkqubo yokuHlolana kwaMazwe ase-Afrika (i-APRM).

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula SEZ ya kwa Namakwa e kwa Aggeneys mo porofenseng ya Kapa Bokone.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi nabemi bonke boMzantsi Afrika baza kubhiyozela uSuku lwe-Afrika njengelizwekazi le-Afrika kunye nehlabathi, ngoLwesine, umhla wama-25 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Lefelo leno le neseditswe pula go ya ka Molao wa Mafelo a Itlhophileng Ikonomi wa ngwaga wa 2014 (Molao wa bo 16 wa 2014) mmogo le SEZ eo tshitshintsweng eo leng karolo ya Letsholo la Dipeeletso la Moporesitente.
tgt_text: Lo nyaka ubaluleke nangakumbi kuba ngunyaka wama-60 wesikhumbuzo sokutyikitywa koxwebhu olwaseka uMbutho woManyano lwe-Afrika (i-OAU), yona eyazala uMbutho weMbumba ye- Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: SEZ ya kwa Namakwa tla letlelela dikgato tsa go bula meepo, go tlhagisa leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo, go agiwa ga mafaratlhatlha, motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa mmogo le tlhagiso ya dikuno tsa temothuo.
tgt_text: Umxholo wemibhiyozo yowama-2023 othi – “Ukukhawulezisa ukuqaliswa koMmandla weLizwekazi le-Afrika ongaHlawulisani iRhafu yoRhwebelwano” – wakhela kulo msebenzi mkhulu sele wenziwe wokuseka nokuqinisekisa ukuba uyenza lo mmandla unguwona mkhulu ungahlawulisani irhafu yorhwebelwano.

src_text: Makala ano botlhokwa mo go tlholeng ditiro le mo go godiseng ikonomi ya porofense ya Kapa Bokone le ya naga..
tgt_text: Imibhiyozo yeNyanga ye-Afrika yalo nyaka ibanjwe kanye ngeminyake engama-20 yesikhumbuzo se-APRM, eneenjongo zokuphucula iindlela zolawulo kweli lizwekazi ngokuthi amazwe alo afundisane aze ahlolane odwa

src_text: Go setse go dirilwe maikano dipeeletso feta R29 bilione mo kgatong ya ntlha ya SEZ.
tgt_text: IziGqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Mo go ona go akarediwa Vedanta Zinc (R16 bilione), Frontier Rare Earth (R13 bilione), Hive Energy (R200 milione) le RRS Trade and Investment (R100 milione)..
tgt_text: UMmandla oKhethekileyo wezoQoqosho (i-SEZ) wase-Namakwa.

src_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Kgatiso ya Boraro ya Leano la Naga la Mafaratlhatlha Metsi (NWRS-3) sa Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukuthiywa ngokusesikweni kwe-Namakwa SEZ e-Aggeneys eMntla Koloni.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula NWRS-3 ya 2023 gore tsenngwe tirisong mme leano leno le gokelela batlhankedi ba bagolo botlhe le ditheo tsotlhe tseo di rweleng maikarabelo go tsenya tirong Molao wa Metsi Naga wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Le ndawo iza kubizwa ngokuba yi-SEZ ngokoMthetho weMimandla eKhethekileyo yezoQoqosho, wowama-2014 (uMthetho uNombl 16 wowama-2014) futhi le SEZ icetywayo iyinxalenye yePhulo likaMongameli loTyalo-mali.

src_text: Leano leno le tsamaisana le tshekatsheko e diriwang morago ga dingwaga tse dingwe le tse dingwe di le tharo ya NWRS-2, mo go nopotsweng dikarolo tse le atlegileng mo go tsona mmogo le dikarolo tse go santseng go na le dikgwetlho mo go tsona..
tgt_text: I-Namakwa SEZ iza kuvula amathuba kwicandelo lokuxhamlisa kwezemigodi, elokuveliswa kwehaydrojini engeyongozi kokusingqongileyo, uphuhliso lweziseko zophuhliso, amandla ahlaziyekayo kunye nokucolwa kuhlelwa iimveliso zolimo.

src_text: NWRS-3 na le dintlha di le tharo tse di botlhokwa leng go dira bonnete jwa gore metsi le kgeleloleswe di tlisa tlhabologo, go fedisa khumanego le go se lekalekane, go nna le seabe mo ikonoming le mo go tlholeng ditiro, mme ka jalo metsi tshwanetswe go tlhokomelwa dirisiwe phepafadiwe laolwe le go elwa tlhoko ka go somarela le ka go abela batho ka go lekana.
tgt_text: La macandelo abaluleke kakhulu kumalinge okudala imisebenzi kunye nophuhliso loqoqosho lwaseMntla Koloni nolwelizwe.

src_text: Leano leno le tlhagisa ditshitshinyo tse di utlwagalang mo go oketseng tlamelo ya metsi, go foka tiriso ya metsi, go tlhokomela ka tshwanelo metsi le kgeleloleswe, go tsenya tirisong melao ya go laola lephata la metsi le kgeleloleswe, go abela setšhaba metsi gore re fetole batsholateu, go rotloetsa tirisanommogo le ditheo tsa boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le go tlhokomela metsi le kgeleloleswe ka fa tlase ga maemo phetogo ya maemo loapi..
tgt_text: Imali yotyalo-mali engaphezulu kweebhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama-29 sele ibekelwe bucala ukuncedisa kwisigaba sokuqala sale SEZ.

src_text: NWRS-3 phasaladitswe mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe www.dws.gov.za..
tgt_text: Le mali iquka izithembiso ezazenziwe ngu-Vedanta Zinc (ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-16), ngu-Frontier Rare Earth (ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-13), Hive Energy (ezizigidi zeerandi ezingama-200) kunye no-RRS Trade and Investment (ezizigidi zeerandi ezili-100).

src_text: Pegelo e ka ga Dikgato tse Lefapha la Sesole (DoD) le di Tsenyang Tirisong go Samagana le Maitsholo Masole Sesole sa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa (SANDF) a Rometsweng kwa Dinageng tse di Nang le Dikgotlang go Dira Bonnete jwa gore go Rena Kagiso.
tgt_text: UPapasho lwesiThathu lwesiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe seMithombo yaManzi (i-NWRS-3) lowama-.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo ya dikgatelopele tseo naga ya Aforika Borwa di dirileng mo go tseeleng dikgato maitsholo a mangwe masole SANDF a romilweng go dira bonnete jwa gore go rena kagiso mo mafelong ao ba romilweng mo go ona go ralala le kontinente.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyivumile i-NWRS-3 yowama-2023 ukuba iqalise ukusetyenziswa kwaye esi sicwangciso-qhinga sibophelela onke amaziko namagosa anamagunya ukuba aqalise ukusebenzisa uMthetho waManzi eSizwe, wowe-1998 (uMthetho 36 wowe-1998).

src_text: SANDF ke setheo se naga ipelang ka sona ka ntlha ya fa se tsaya karolo mo matsholong go tlisa kagiso mo kontinenteng go dira gore mafelo mo go ona go runtseng ntwa ya matlho mahibidu mo kontinenteng ya Aforika go rene kutlwano le kagiso mo go ona ka go ikamanya le tiro ya Dinagakopano (UN)..
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sisekelwe kuphononongo lweminyaka emithathu le-NWRS-2, oluthe lwabona iindawo eziqhube kakuhle kunye nezo kusekho ukuqhwalela kuzo.

src_text: Ka ntlha ya ditatofatso tse di runtseng mo ngwageng wa 2015 tsa gore mangwe masole a rometsweng go thusa ka letsholo la go tlisa kagiso latofadiwa ka mekgwa e tswileng mo taolong ya thobalano, Setlhophatiro sa Ditona se ne sa tlhomiwa mo ngwageng wa 2019 gore se batlisise, mo go DoD, fa dikgetse tseno tsa go robalana le baagi ba dinaga tseo ka go ba solofetsa legodimo le lefatshe le go ba tlhorisa (SEA) le boammaruri..
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 inemixholo engundoqo emithathu, owokuba kufuneka amanzi nogutyulo axhase uphuhliso, ukulwa indlala nokungalingani, ukufaka isandla kuqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi, nokuba amanzi kufuneka akhuselwe, asetyenziswe, aphuhliswe, aphathwe aze alawulwe ngendlela engazikuwatshabalalisa nelinganayo.

src_text: Kabinete kgotsofaditswe ke dikgato tse di setseng di tserwe go samagana le ditiragalo tsa SEA mo matsholong go thusa go tlisa kagiso SANDF.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga senza izindululo ezibambekayo zokuba kwandiswe umthamo wamanzi akhoyo, kuphungulwe isantya asetyenziswa ngaso, ukulawula ngokufanelekileyo kwamanzi nogutyulo, ukuqulunqa imithetho eza kulawula icandelo lezamanzi nogutyulo, ukutshintshwa kwendlela ankinkishwa ngayo kusenzelwa ukwenza iinguqu, ukukhuthaza intsebenziswano namazwe ehlabathi kunye nokukwazi ukulawula amanzi nogutyulo phantsi kwezi meko zokuguqu-guquka kwemozulu.

src_text: UN tsaya Aforika Borwa jaaka sekai mme akgotse ka fao naga setseng samagane le matsapa ano go fedisa SEA mo go SANDF.
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 ipapashwe kule webhusayithi ye-DWS: www.dws.gov.za..

src_text: Kabinete gateletse gore ga kitla letlelela maitsholo a tsamaisanang le SEA phuaganya tiro ntle e itsegeng SANDF e dirang mo kontinenteng..
tgt_text: Ingxelo ngamanyathelo athatyathwe liSebe lezoKhuselo (i-DoD) ukulungisa ingxaki yokuziphatha kwamajoni oMkhosi wezoKhuselo weSizwe waseMzantsi Afrika (i-SANDF) atyalwe kumaphulo ogcino-xolo..

src_text: Kgwedi ya go Keteka Seabe sa Bašwa ya Ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo malunga nomgama osele uhanjwe nguMzantsi Afrika ukulungisa ezi zingxaki zinxulumene nendlela aziphethe ngawo amanye amalungu e-SANDF atyalwe kumaphulo ogcino-xolo kweli lizwekazi lethu.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Letsholo la Ngwaga wa 2023 la Kgwedi ya Bašwa ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go potlakisa thuso ya bašwa mo mererong ya ikonomi gore re kgone go nna le bokamoso jo bo sa tseweng ke phefo”.
tgt_text: I-SANDF ibisinika iwonga nodumo sisisizwe ngokuthatha kwayo inxaxheba kumaphulo ogcino-xolo kweli lizwekazi ukuqinisekisa ukuba kukho uzinzo noxolo kumazwe ase-Afrika athwaxwa zimfazwe ikwenza oku iyinxalenye yeZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN).

src_text: Motlatsamoporesitente Mashatile tla ema ka lefoko Letsatsi leno la Naga mme lona le tla ketekiwa matsatsi le mabedi monongwaga go tloga ka la bo 16 go fitlha ka la bo 17 Seetebosigo 2023 kwa Mangaung Outdoor Sport Centre, Mangaung, Bloemfontein, kwa Porofenseng ya Foreistata.
tgt_text: Ukuvela ngowama-2015 kwezityholo zokuxhaphaza ngokwesondo ezibhekiswa kumajoni ayinxalenye yogcino-xolo kwakhokelela ekubeni kusekwe iKomiti yabaPhathiswa ngowama-2019 ukuze iphande izityholo zokuxhaphaza ngokwesondo nempathombi (i-SEA) kwi-DoD.

src_text: Mo matsatsing le mabedi ao, bašwa ba tla neelwa tšhono ya go buisana le Ditona le Batlatsatona mmogo le ba bangwe ba bannaleseabe mo dikatisong tse di farologaneng tsa go itlhamela dikgwebo le go tlhatlhelelwa ka bokgoni go tswa mo pusong le mo badirisanimmogong ba bangwe mo mererong ya loago..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumance kakhulu ngala manyathelo aza kuthatyathwa ukulwa ezi ngxaki zinxulumene ne-SEA kumaphulo ogcino-xolo e-SANDF.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Bašwa tla thankgololwa ka Labone wa la bo 1 Seetebosigo 2023 ke Tona mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente e Rweleng Maikarabelo Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi bong Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma kwa Musiamong wa Hector Pieterson Memorial kwa Soweto..
tgt_text: I-UN iyawuhlonipha uMzantsi Afrika njengelizwe eliziphatha ngendlela engenasiphako kwaye iliqhwabele izandla eli lizwe ngomsebenzi esele liwenzile wokusiphula neengcambu i-SEA kwi-SANDF.

src_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go gagamatsa matsapa go netefatsa gore bašwa ba fitlhelela ditšhono tsa go nna le seabe mo ikonoming.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikubethelele ukuba imikhutyana ye-SEA ayizikuvunyelwa ukuba ingcolise igama elihle le-SANDF kweli lizwekazi.

src_text: Puso, jaaka le yona e thapang batho ka bontsi tsibogetse botlhokwa jwa tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni mmogo le go thapiwa ga bašwa ka go dira gore bašwa ba bantsi ba ba alogileng ba thapiwe mo matsholong go ithutela tiro mo Lephateng la Ditirelo tsa Puso go tla go ithutela tiro teng.
tgt_text: INyanga yoLutsha yowama-.

src_text: Puso samagane gape le go tsenya tirisong Sekgwama sa Matlole go Thapa Baagi (SEF) mmogo le go tsosolosa Setheo Naga sa Ditirelo tsa Bašwa (NYS) mo matsholo ano tla tlholelang bašwa ba le diketekete ditiro mo ikonoming.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele iNkqubo yowama-2023 yeNyanga yoLutsha phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukukhawulezisa amaphulo okuxhobisa ulutsha ngezoqoqosho ukwenzela ikamva eliqaqambileyo”.

src_text: Letsholo la Moporesidente la Kemonokeng ya Bašwa ka Ditiro le setse le atlegile mo go emeng nokeng ditšhono di le milione le halofo ka megolo ya letseno la nakwana, go tsenya tirong batho ba le milione le mongwe, ditšhono di le 250 000 tsa go tlhatlhelelwa ka bokgoni le mo tirong, ditšhono di le 250 000 tsa go lefelwa mabapi le ditirelo tse di abilweng mmogo le bašwa ba le 500 000 ba ba kgonang go itirela letseno le le tla gogang sebaka.
tgt_text: USekela-Mongameli uMashatile uza kwenza intetho ngoSuku lweSizwe kulo nyaka oluza kuqhuba iintsuku ezimbini ukususela ngomhla we-16 ukuya kowe-17 kweyeSilimela 2023 e-Mangaung Outdoor Sport Centre, e-Mangaung, e-Bloemfontein, eFreyistatha.

src_text: Jaaka re tsena mo Kgweding eno ya Bašwa, puso gakolola bašwa gore ba ikwadise mo sefalaneng sa SAYouth.mobi jaaka bankane ba bona ba le dimilione di le dine bona ba setse ba ikwadisitse, mme seno ke sefalana se ditiro di phasaladiwang teng.
tgt_text: Eza ntsuku zimbini ziza kunika ulutsha ithuba lokuthatha inxaxheba kwiingxoxo kunye nabaPhathiswa, amaSekela abaPhathiswa kunye namanye amahlakani ezimalunga namathuba amaninzi akhoyo ezoqoqosho, ushishino nophuhliso kurhulumente nakumahlakani ezentlalo.

src_text: Go Tshwara Mmogo Foramo ya bo Robedi ya Dikgwebo tsa Temothuo tsa Aforika mo Dipatlisisong tsa Lephata la Temothuo (FARA) e Leng Karolo ya Beke ya Saense Mmogo le Kopanokgothakgothe ya Yona ya Borobongwe.
tgt_text: INyanga yoLutsha iza kuphehlelelwa ngokusesikweni ngoLwesine, umhla woku-1 kweyeSilimela nguMphathiswa okwi-Ofisi kaMongameli wezamaNina, uLutsha kunye naBantu abaKhubazekileyo, uGq Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma e-Hector Pieterson Memorial and Museum e-Soweto.

src_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tshwara mmogo FARA e Leng Karolo ya Beke ya Saense Mmogo le Kopanokgothakgothe ya Yona ya Borobongwe gore tshwarelwe kwa Durban go tloga ka la bo 5 go fitlha ka la bo 9 Seetebosigo..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi icele isizwe ukuba siwaqinise amalinge okuqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha bayawafumana amathuba aza kubanceda ukuba bakwazi ukudlala indima ebonakalayo kuqoqosho.

src_text: FARA ke mokgatlho mogolo mo kontinenteng o rwelelng maikarabelo go disa le go tsamaisa dipatlisiso tsa merero ya temothuo mmogo le go godisa boitlhamedi ka fa kontinenteng..
tgt_text: Urhulumente, njengolona qumrhu liqeshe abona bantu baninzi, uthathe amanyathelo afanelekileyo okusabela kumba wokufuneka kophuhliso lwezakhono kunye nokuqeshwa kolutsha ngokuvumela abo banezidanga bangasebenziyo ukuba bafumane amava omsebenzi ngokusebenzisa i-Public Service Graduate Internship and Leadership Programme.

src_text: Ka go tshwara kopano eno, naga ya Aforika Borwa tla unngwelwa ke tirisanommogo eno mmogo le tirisanommogo magareng ga ditheo tsa dipatlisiso tsa temothuo ka fa kontinenteng gonne mo go yona go tla tlhabanwa botlhale ka tsa saense le dipatlisiso tse di mabapi le temothuo.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uqalise amaphulo okudala imisebenzi aquka i-Social Employment Fund waze wavuselela ne-National Youth Service (i-NYS) enika amawaka abantu abatsha amathuba okuba bakwazi ukuthatha inxaxheba kuqoqosho.

src_text: Aforika Borwa tsaya dipatlisiso mo mererong ya temothuo jaaka selo se se botlhokwa fa go tla mo tlhabologong, segolo jang fa re lebelela maemo phetogoloapi mmogo le mabaka mangwe a dirang gore naga tlhoke dijo tse di lekaneng godise maemo ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro.

tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilamkele uyilo loMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo we-IPID wowama-2023 ukuba lungeniswe ePalamente..

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono neela maatla ditshwaelo tse di dirilweng ke Phanele ya Moporesitente ya Maemo a kwa Godimo ya go Sekaseka Maemo Setho sa Phemelo ya Puso (SSA) mmogo le go diragatsa maano go tsenya tirisong ditshwaelo tse di dirilweng ke Khomišene ya Diphuruphutso Mabapi le go Goga Puso ka Nko, Bogodu le Bonweenwee mo Ditheong tsa Puso mmogo le mo Ditlamong tsa Puso..
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenza izilungiso kuMthetho we-IPID wowama-2011 (uMthetho uNombl 1 wowama-2011), kwaye wenza neziphakamiso ezineenjongo zokuqinisekisa ukuba i-IPID izimele ngenene njengequmrhu kwakunye nendlela esebenza ngayo, into leyo izalisekisa imigqaliselo eyayimiselwe kwisigwebo setyala lika-McBride.

src_text: Gare ga tse dingwe tse dintsi maitlhomo Molaotlhomo ono ke go
tgt_text: Ezi zizilungiso ziza kusabela kanye kwimiba ephakanyiswe yiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko eyathi amanye amasolotya oMthetho we-IPID wowama-2011 awekho mthethweni, agunyazisa uMphathiswa wezamaPolisa ukuba anqumamise uMlawuli wesiGqeba, ukuba athathele amanyathelo oluleko uMlawuli wesiGqeba emva kokuba enqunyanyisiwe, nokuba amgxothe uMlawuli wesiGqeba kwisikhundla sakhe..

src_text: go rulaganya sešwa ditirelo tsa go lwantshana le bosenyi gore go nne le sebopego sa setheo se se kgonang go dira tiro ka botswapelo le ka matshwanedi ka go tlhoma setheo sa go lwantshana le bosenyi se se tla samaganang le merero ya ka fa nageng mmogo le se se tla samagananang le merero ya boditšhaba
